tool_description: An API to get latest news about climate
name: Climate News To-date
title: Climate News To-date

api_list.name: Get Climate News information from Specific News channel
api_list.description:
This endpoint provides climate news information from specific online news channel. Available news channels are:
thetimes
guardian
telegraph
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-news-to-date.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-news-to-date.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-news-to-date.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-news-to-date.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate News Information
api_list.description: This endpoint will get all daily current information about Climate news from around the Globe published online.
api_list.code:

url = "https://climate-news-to-date.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-news-to-date.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
